AMECard.Name: Audio Classification
AMECard.Definition: Determine if an audio segment represents a specified/one from a list of specified concept class(es).

Input.Name: ClassesToDetect
Input.Representation: List of identifiers of classes to be detected

Input.Name: ModelToUse
Input.Definition: If applicable, audio model to use for detection.

Output.Name: Classification
Output.Definition: Per object class, a list of time indexed regions

Output.Name: Confidence
Output.Definition: Confidence of the result (per detected instance)
